verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H3588>When<s%> any <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H376><s%> <S%H1961>hath<s%> a running <S%H2100>issue<s%> out of his <S%H4480>flesh,<s%> <S%H1320><s%> because of his <S%H2101>issue<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> is <S%H2931>unclean.<s%>

And <S%H2063>this<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> his <S%H2932>uncleanness<s%> in his <S%H2101>issue:<s%> whether his <S%H1320>flesh<s%> <S%H7325>run<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> his <S%H2101>issue,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> his <S%H1320>flesh<s%> be <S%H2856>stopped<s%> from his <S%H4480>issue,<s%> <S%H2101><s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is his <S%H2932>uncleanness.<s%>

Every <S%H3605><s%> <S%H4904>bed,<s%> <S%H834>whereon<s%> <S%H5921><s%> he <S%H7901>lieth<s%> that hath the <S%H2100>issue,<s%> is <S%H2930>unclean:<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H3627>thing,<s%> <S%H834>whereon<s%> <S%H5921><s%> he <S%H3427>sitteth,<s%> shall be <S%H2930>unclean.<s%>

And <S%H376>whosoever<s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H5060>toucheth<s%> his <S%H4904>bed<s%> shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and <S%H7364>bathe<s%> himself in <S%H4325>water,<s%> and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H6153>even.<s%>

And he that <S%H3427>sitteth<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> any <S%H3627>thing<s%> <S%H834>whereon<s%> <S%H5921><s%> he <S%H3427>sat<s%> that hath the <S%H2100>issue<s%> shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and <S%H7364>bathe<s%> himself in <S%H4325>water,<s%> and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H6153>even.<s%>

And he that <S%H5060>toucheth<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of him that hath the <S%H2100>issue<s%> shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and <S%H7364>bathe<s%> himself in <S%H4325>water,<s%> and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H6153>even.<s%>

And <S%H3588>if<s%> he that hath the <S%H2100>issue<s%> <S%H7556>spit<s%> upon him that is <S%H2889>clean;<s%> then he shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and <S%H7364>bathe<s%> himself in <S%H4325>water,<s%> and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H6153>even.<s%>
And what saddle <S%H3605>soever<s%> <S%H4817><s%> <S%H834><s%> he <S%H7392>rideth<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> that hath the <S%H2100>issue<s%> shall be <S%H2930>unclean.<s%>

And <S%H3605>whosoever<s%> <S%H5060>toucheth<s%> any <S%H3605>thing<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> him shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H6153>even:<s%> and he that <S%H5375>beareth<s%> any of those things shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and <S%H7364>bathe<s%> himself in <S%H4325>water,<s%> and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H6153>even.<s%>

And <S%H3605>whomsoever<s%> <S%H834><s%> he <S%H5060>toucheth<s%> that hath the <S%H2100>issue,<s%> and hath <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7857>rinsed<s%> his <S%H3027>hands<s%> in <S%H4325>water,<s%> he shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and <S%H7364>bathe<s%> himself in <S%H4325>water,<s%> and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H6153>even.<s%>

And the <S%H3627>vessel<s%> of <S%H2789>earth,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he <S%H5060>toucheth<s%> which hath the <S%H2100>issue,<s%> shall be <S%H7665>broken:<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H3627>vessel<s%> of <S%H6086>wood<s%> shall be <S%H7857>rinsed<s%> in <S%H4325>water.<s%>

And <S%H3588>when<s%> he that hath an <S%H2100>issue<s%> is <S%H2891>cleansed<s%> of his <S%H4480>issue;<s%> <S%H2101><s%> then he shall <S%H5608>number<s%> to himself <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> for his <S%H2893>cleansing,<s%> and <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and <S%H7364>bathe<s%> his <S%H1320>flesh<s%> in <S%H2416>running<s%> <S%H4325>water,<s%> and shall be <S%H2891>clean.<s%>

And on the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> he shall <S%H3947>take<s%> to him <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8449>turtledoves,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H3123>pigeons,<s%> and <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> and <S%H5414>give<s%> them <S%H413>unto<s%> the priest: <S%H3548><s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> them, the <S%H259>one<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering,<s%> and the <S%H259>other<s%> for a burnt <S%H5930>offering;<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> him <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> for his <S%H4480>issue.<s%> <S%H2101><s%>

And <S%H3588>if<s%> any <S%H376>man's<s%> <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H7902>copulation<s%> go <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> him, then he shall <S%H7364>wash<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H1320>flesh<s%> in <S%H4325>water,<s%> and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H6153>even.<s%>

And <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H899>garment,<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H5785>skin,<s%> <S%H834>whereon<s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H1961>is<s%> the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H7902>copulation,<s%> shall be <S%H3526>washed<s%> with <S%H4325>water,<s%> and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H6153>even.<s%>

The <S%H802>woman<s%> also with <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H7901>lie<s%> with <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H7902>copulation,<s%> they shall both <S%H7364>bathe<s%> themselves in <S%H4325>water,<s%> and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H6153>even.<s%>

And <S%H3588>if<s%> a <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H1961>have<s%> an <S%H2100>issue,<s%> and her <S%H2101>issue<s%> in her <S%H1320>flesh<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H1818>blood,<s%> she shall <S%H1961>be<s%> put <S%H5079>apart<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days:<s%> and <S%H3605>whosoever<s%> <S%H5060>toucheth<s%> her shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H6153>even.<s%>

And every <S%H3605>thing<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> she <S%H7901>lieth<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> in her <S%H5079>separation<s%> shall be <S%H2930>unclean:<s%> every <S%H3605>thing<s%> also <S%H834>that<s%> she <S%H3427>sitteth<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> shall be <S%H2930>unclean.<s%>

And <S%H3605>whosoever<s%> <S%H5060>toucheth<s%> her <S%H4904>bed<s%> shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and <S%H7364>bathe<s%> himself in <S%H4325>water,<s%> and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H6153>even.<s%>

And <S%H3605>whosoever<s%> <S%H5060>toucheth<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H3627>thing<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> she <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and <S%H7364>bathe<s%> himself in <S%H4325>water,<s%> and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H6153>even.<s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> be <S%H5921>on<s%> her <S%H4904>bed,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> any <S%H3627>thing<s%> <S%H834>whereon<s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H1931>she<s%> <S%H3427>sitteth,<s%> when he <S%H5060>toucheth<s%> it, he shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H6153>even.<s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> any <S%H376>man<s%> lie with her at <S%H7901>all,<s%> <S%H7901><s%> <S%H853><s%> and her <S%H5079>flowers<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> him, he shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days;<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4904>bed<s%> <S%H834>whereon<s%> <S%H5921><s%> he <S%H7901>lieth<s%> shall be <S%H2930>unclean.<s%>

And <S%H3588>if<s%> a <S%H802>woman<s%> have an <S%H2100>issue<s%> <S%H2101><s%> of her <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> out <S%H3808>of<s%> the <S%H6256>time<s%> of her <S%H5079>separation,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H3588>if<s%> it <S%H2100>run<s%> <S%H5921>beyond<s%> the time of her <S%H5079>separation;<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H2101>issue<s%> of her <S%H2932>uncleanness<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> as the <S%H3117>days<s%> of her <S%H5079>separation:<s%> <S%H1931>she<s%> shall be <S%H2931>unclean.<s%>

Every <S%H3605><s%> <S%H4904>bed<s%> <S%H834>whereon<s%> <S%H5921><s%> she <S%H7901>lieth<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of her <S%H2101>issue<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> unto her as the <S%H4904>bed<s%> of her <S%H5079>separation:<s%> and <S%H3605>whatsoever<s%> <S%H3627><s%> she <S%H3427>sitteth<s%> <S%H834>upon<s%> <S%H5921><s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H2931>unclean,<s%> as the <S%H2932>uncleanness<s%> of her <S%H5079>separation.<s%>

And <S%H3605>whosoever<s%> <S%H5060>toucheth<s%> those things shall be <S%H2930>unclean,<s%> and shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and <S%H7364>bathe<s%> himself in <S%H4325>water,<s%> and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H6153>even.<s%>

But <S%H518>if<s%> she be <S%H2891>cleansed<s%> of her <S%H4480>issue,<s%> <S%H2101><s%> then she shall <S%H5608>number<s%> to herself <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> and after <S%H310>that<s%> she shall be <S%H2891>clean.<s%>

And on the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> she shall <S%H3947>take<s%> unto her <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8449>turtles,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H3123>pigeons,<s%> and <S%H935>bring<s%> them <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation.<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H259>one<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering,<s%> and the <S%H259>other<s%> for a burnt <S%H5930>offering;<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> her <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> for the <S%H4480>issue<s%> <S%H2101><s%> of her <S%H2932>uncleanness.<s%>

Thus shall ye <S%H5144>separate<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from their <S%H4480>uncleanness;<s%> <S%H2932><s%> that they <S%H4191>die<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> in their <S%H2932>uncleanness,<s%> when they <S%H2930>defile<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is <S%H8432>among<s%> them.

This <S%H2063><s%> is the <S%H8451>law<s%> of him that hath an <S%H2100>issue,<s%> and of him <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H7902>seed<s%> <S%H2233><s%> <S%H3318>goeth<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> him, and is <S%H2930>defiled<s%> therewith;

And of her that is <S%H1739>sick<s%> of her <S%H5079>flowers,<s%> and of him that hath an <S%H2100>issue,<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2101><s%> of the <S%H2145>man,<s%> and of the <S%H5347>woman,<s%> and of <S%H376>him<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H7901>lieth<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> her that is <S%H2931>unclean.<s%>
